content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":129511,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":129512,"originalJapaneseLine":"元ヘルマン共和国、首都――","translatedEnglishLine":"Former Helman Republic, capital city—"},{"lineNumber":129513,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホルスの制止を無視して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignoring Horus's warnings,"},{"lineNumber":129514,"originalJapaneseLine":"街に出たランス達は言葉を失った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and his group who went out into the town were left speechless."},{"lineNumber":129515,"originalJapaneseLine":"伝統あるラング・バウの城は既に","translatedEnglishLine":"The traditional Lang Bau castle was already"},{"lineNumber":129516,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物に支配されていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"under the control of monsters."},{"lineNumber":129517,"originalJapaneseLine":"広場では捕らえられた人間が奴隷として","translatedEnglishLine":"In the square, captured humans were being sold as slaves"},{"lineNumber":129518,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物達に売られている。","translatedEnglishLine":"to the monsters."},{"lineNumber":129519,"originalJapaneseLine":"首に縄をかけられ魔物に引きずられ、","translatedEnglishLine":"With ropes around their necks, dragged by monsters,"},{"lineNumber":129520,"originalJapaneseLine":"四つん這いで歩く娘達は、一様に泣き叫ぶか、","translatedEnglishLine":"the girls crawling on all fours uniformly cried and screamed, or"},{"lineNumber":129521,"originalJapaneseLine":"現状に絶望し、瞳を濁らせていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"in despair of their situation, their eyes clouded."},{"lineNumber":129522,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイプされ、股から血を流したまま","translatedEnglishLine":"Some girls were raped and lying unconscious,"},{"lineNumber":129523,"originalJapaneseLine":"気絶している娘もいくつか転がっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"bleeding from between their legs."},{"lineNumber":129524,"originalJapaneseLine":"その体は既に冷たくなっている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Their bodies were already cold."},{"lineNumber":129525,"originalJapaneseLine":"男達はより悲惨であり、","translatedEnglishLine":"The men were even more miserable,"},{"lineNumber":129526,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ苦痛を与えることを目的に苦痛を与えられ、","translatedEnglishLine":"purely inflicted with pain for the purpose of causing suffering,"},{"lineNumber":129527,"originalJapaneseLine":"広場にいる男性で四肢が無事な者の方が少ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Among the men in the square, those whose limbs remained intact were few."},{"lineNumber":129528,"originalJapaneseLine":"鮮血、悲鳴、悪臭、肌を粟立たせる怒号。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fresh blood, screams, foul stench, and enraged shouts that made the skin crawl."},{"lineNumber":129529,"originalJapaneseLine":"五感がここは地獄であると告げていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The five senses told them this place was hell."},{"lineNumber":129530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これが、三年後の世界か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So this is the world three years later...\""},

{"lineNumber":129531,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんな、こんなの……ひどすぎます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This, this is... too horrible...\""},

{"lineNumber":129532,"originalJapaneseLine":"街の片隅から覗き込んでいたランス達は","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others, peering in from a corner of the town,"},

{"lineNumber":129533,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまりにひどい光景に顔色を失っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were pale-faced at the terribly cruel scene."},

{"lineNumber":129534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヘルマンがこの様子なら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If Helman is like this..."},

{"lineNumber":129535,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱり、リーザスも、もう……","translatedEnglishLine":"then Rizas is probably already... too..."},

{"lineNumber":129536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ……リア様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... Lady Ria..."},

{"lineNumber":129537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラは、サテラはこれからどうしたら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Satera, what should Satera do from now on...?"},

{"lineNumber":129538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……仕方ないな。お前ら、逃げるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It can't be helped. You all, let's run away.\" "},

{"lineNumber":129539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どこへですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wh-Where to?\" "},

{"lineNumber":129540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どっか魔物のいない場所だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To somewhere without monsters."},

{"lineNumber":129541,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ノロノロするな、捕まったらお前も奴隷だぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't dawdle—if you get caught, you'll become a slave too.\" "},

{"lineNumber":129542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes!\" "},

{"lineNumber":129543,"originalJapaneseLine":"去る前に、ランスは地獄に振り返る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Before leaving, Lance glanced back at this hell."},

{"lineNumber":129544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ちっ、人類め、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Tch, humanity,"},

{"lineNumber":129545,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺が眠っている間に、負けやがって」","translatedEnglishLine":"you lost while I was asleep."},

{"lineNumber":129546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もし、俺様がいたら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If I were here..."},

{"lineNumber":129547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「フン……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph..."},

{"lineNumber":129548,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの口の中でのみの呟きは虚空に溶け、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance's murmurs inside his mouth dissolved into the void,"},

{"lineNumber":129549,"originalJapaneseLine":"聞いたものは誰もいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"and no one heard them."},

{"lineNumber":129550,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物からの逃亡の生活を強いられたランスは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Forced to live a life on the run from monsters, Lance"},

{"lineNumber":129551,"originalJapaneseLine":"これ以降、歴史の表に出てくることはなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"did not appear in recorded history from this point on."},

{"lineNumber":129552,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、魔物達は歴史的な繁栄を謳歌する。","translatedEnglishLine":"And the monsters enjoyed a historic prosperity."},

{"lineNumber":129553,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは人類の地獄であった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a hell for humanity."},

{"lineNumber":129554,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},

{"lineNumber":129555,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},

{"lineNumber":129556,"originalJapaneseLine":"『……やめておこう』","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Let's not do this.\" "},

{"lineNumber":129557,"originalJapaneseLine":"三年後のその日、","translatedEnglishLine":"On that day three years later,"},

{"lineNumber":129558,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は目覚めることが出来なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others could not awaken."},

{"lineNumber":129559,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日この日をきりに、ホルス達の間でも","translatedEnglishLine":"As of this day, even among Horus and the others,"},

{"lineNumber":129560,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達の存在は完全に忘れられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and his group's existence was completely forgotten."},

{"lineNumber":129561,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして気の遠くなるような年月が経過した。","translatedEnglishLine":"And an unfathomably long time passed."},

{"lineNumber":129562,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},

{"lineNumber":129563,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},

{"lineNumber":129564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、んん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, hmm...?\" "},

{"lineNumber":129565,"originalJapaneseLine":"外からの操作により","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to an external operation,"},

{"lineNumber":129566,"originalJapaneseLine":"コールドスリープ装置が止まり、","translatedEnglishLine":"the cold sleep device stopped,"},

{"lineNumber":129567,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は目を覚ました。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Lance and the others woke up."},

{"lineNumber":129568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁ……なんだ、いつの間に寝たんだ……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fwaa... What, since when did I fall asleep...?\" "},

{"lineNumber":129569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うーむ、なんだか記憶がハッキリせんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, my memories are somehow unclear...\" "},

{"lineNumber":129570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、目が覚めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I'm awake."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元ヘルマン共和国、首都――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Former Helman Republic, capital city—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルスの制止を無視して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Horus's warnings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街に出たランス達は言葉を失った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group who went out into the town were left speechless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝統あるラング・バウの城は既に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The traditional Lang Bau castle was already

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に支配されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: under the control of monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広場では捕らえられた人間が奴隷として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the square, captured humans were being sold as slaves

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達に売られている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首に縄をかけられ魔物に引きずられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With ropes around their necks, dragged by monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四つん這いで歩く娘達は、一様に泣き叫ぶか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the girls crawling on all fours uniformly cried and screamed, or

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現状に絶望し、瞳を濁らせていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in despair of their situation, their eyes clouded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイプされ、股から血を流したまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some girls were raped and lying unconscious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気絶している娘もいくつか転がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: bleeding from between their legs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その体は既に冷たくなっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their bodies were already cold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男達はより悲惨であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The men were even more miserable,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ苦痛を与えることを目的に苦痛を与えられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: purely inflicted with pain for the purpose of causing suffering,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広場にいる男性で四肢が無事な者の方が少ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the men in the square, those whose limbs remained intact were few.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鮮血、悲鳴、悪臭、肌を粟立たせる怒号。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fresh blood, screams, foul stench, and enraged shouts that made the skin crawl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五感がここは地獄であると告げていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The five senses told them this place was hell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが、三年後の世界か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So this is the world three years later..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな、こんなの……ひどすぎます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This, this is... too horrible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街の片隅から覗き込んでいたランス達は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others, peering in from a corner of the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりにひどい光景に顔色を失っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were pale-faced at the terribly cruel scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマンがこの様子なら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If Helman is like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり、リーザスも、もう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then Rizas is probably already... too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ……リア様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... Lady Ria...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラは、サテラはこれからどうしたら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satera, what should Satera do from now on...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……仕方ないな。お前ら、逃げるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It can't be helped. You all, let's run away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ど、どこへですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wh-Where to?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっか魔物のいない場所だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To somewhere without monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ノロノロするな、捕まったらお前も奴隷だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't dawdle—if you get caught, you'll become a slave too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 去る前に、ランスは地獄に振り返る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before leaving, Lance glanced back at this hell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ちっ、人類め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Tch, humanity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が眠っている間に、負けやがって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you lost while I was asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もし、俺様がいたら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I were here...
Hmph...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの口の中でのみの呟きは虚空に溶け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance's murmurs inside his mouth dissolved into the void,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いたものは誰もいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and no one heard them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物からの逃亡の生活を強いられたランスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Forced to live a life on the run from monsters, Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以降、歴史の表に出てくることはなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: did not appear in recorded history from this point on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、魔物達は歴史的な繁栄を謳歌する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the monsters enjoyed a historic prosperity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは人類の地獄であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a hell for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『……やめておこう』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Let's not do this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三年後のその日、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On that day three years later,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は目覚めることが出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others could not awaken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日この日をきりに、ホルス達の間でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As of this day, even among Horus and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の存在は完全に忘れられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group's existence was completely forgotten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして気の遠くなるような年月が経過した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And an unfathomably long time passed.
"Hmm, hmm...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外からの操作により
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to an external operation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ装置が止まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the cold sleep device stopped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は目を覚ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Lance and the others woke up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわぁ……なんだ、いつの間に寝たんだ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fwaa... What, since when did I fall asleep...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーむ、なんだか記憶がハッキリせんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, my memories are somehow unclear..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、目が覚めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I'm awake.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Horus's warnings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街に出たランス達は言葉を失った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group who went out into the town were left speechless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝統あるラング・バウの城は既に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The traditional Lang Bau castle was already

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に支配されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: under the control of monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達に売られている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首に縄をかけられ魔物に引きずられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With ropes around their necks, dragged by monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四つん這いで歩く娘達は、一様に泣き叫ぶか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the girls crawling on all fours uniformly cried and screamed, or

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現状に絶望し、瞳を濁らせていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in despair of their situation, their eyes clouded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイプされ、股から血を流したまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some girls were raped and lying unconscious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気絶している娘もいくつか転がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: bleeding from between their legs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その体は既に冷たくなっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their bodies were already cold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男達はより悲惨であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The men were even more miserable,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ苦痛を与えることを目的に苦痛を与えられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: purely inflicted with pain for the purpose of causing suffering,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広場にいる男性で四肢が無事な者の方が少ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the men in the square, those whose limbs remained intact were few.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鮮血、悲鳴、悪臭、肌を粟立たせる怒号。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fresh blood, screams, foul stench, and enraged shouts that made the skin crawl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五感がここは地獄であると告げていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The five senses told them this place was hell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが、三年後の世界か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So this is the world three years later..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな、こんなの……ひどすぎます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This, this is... too horrible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街の片隅から覗き込んでいたランス達は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others, peering in from a corner of the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりにひどい光景に顔色を失っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were pale-faced at the terribly cruel scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマンがこの様子なら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If Helman is like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり、リーザスも、もう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then Rizas is probably already... too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ……リア様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... Lady Ria...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラは、サテラはこれからどうしたら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satera, what should Satera do from now on...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……仕方ないな。お前ら、逃げるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It can't be helped. You all, let's run away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ど、どこへですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wh-Where to?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっか魔物のいない場所だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To somewhere without monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ノロノロするな、捕まったらお前も奴隷だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't dawdle—if you get caught, you'll become a slave too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 去る前に、ランスは地獄に振り返る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before leaving, Lance glanced back at this hell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ちっ、人類め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Tch, humanity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が眠っている間に、負けやがって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you lost while I was asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もし、俺様がいたら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I were here...
Hmph...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの口の中でのみの呟きは虚空に溶け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance's murmurs inside his mouth dissolved into the void,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いたものは誰もいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and no one heard them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物からの逃亡の生活を強いられたランスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Forced to live a life on the run from monsters, Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以降、歴史の表に出てくることはなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: did not appear in recorded history from this point on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、魔物達は歴史的な繁栄を謳歌する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the monsters enjoyed a historic prosperity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは人類の地獄であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a hell for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『……やめておこう』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Let's not do this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三年後のその日、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On that day three years later,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は目覚めることが出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others could not awaken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日この日をきりに、ホルス達の間でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As of this day, even among Horus and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の存在は完全に忘れられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group's existence was completely forgotten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして気の遠くなるような年月が経過した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And an unfathomably long time passed.
"Hmm, hmm...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外からの操作により
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to an external operation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ装置が止まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the cold sleep device stopped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は目を覚ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Lance and the others woke up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわぁ……なんだ、いつの間に寝たんだ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fwaa... What, since when did I fall asleep...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーむ、なんだか記憶がハッキリせんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, my memories are somehow unclear..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、目が覚めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I'm awake.
